body: He asked for sex at the end and got it - why are people bitching about how he got rejected?
The art and sex is good and all but the plot is kinda meh.
Good art, but I don't like the story 4/6
Awful awful awful. Is there really any more proof needed that sadists are just terrible people?
i feel really bad. i do not know why. the end of series look only a little bad, they still friend. but i just feel sad.
this one left a bad after taste ..

Wait let's predict for next chapter. First couple will have sex in school, make little boy jealous, and start searching for futa but end up in culb. Club full futanaris and have pleasure. at end we see the girl jerk off desperate for sex. The end
@Ravenleaf. ... I'm good mate. Not my thing.

@Feddric0 wanna talk about disproportionate punishment, check this out: https://nhentai.net/g/97858/ there is actually a few more where they go seriously over the top. Thats one of them, but I still like it a lot anyway :P

@Ravenleaf Hoi... I know these guys are supposed to be cunts, but there is such a thing as disproportionate punishment. The other girl seems to be manipulative, it appears that she might be trying to "ruin" the guy.
@Feddric0 if you go back and read...part 2? it might even be part 1, it describes the girls though, it hinted this girl might do this and described the other one as even more cruel/sadistic.

@Ravenleaf She's less the "nice" one, more the dishonest one. I straight up wanted to slap her at the end of this though. She did all this shit, ended making him endeared to her, then just drops him. There is a certain measure of cruelty to that.

Thats really a shame... I was really rooting for these two, they seemed like a good couple, plus she seemed to like him too. Plus it seems the girls aren't all that innocent, even if the guys were douches. The scary part, is this one is the "nice" one and the other one has the sadist/cruel streak, wonder what shes planning to do to the other guy?
